ProductInfo.Features:

<8> Precision Design 58" Tripod + <9> PD 67mm (UV/CPL/ND8) Filters + <10> Universal Pop-Up Diffuser + <11> PD HDMI to Mini-HDMI Cable +
<12> Precision Design ML-L3 Remote + <13> PD 6pc Complete Cleaning Kit + <14> PD 8 SD Card Memory Card Case + <15> LCD Screen Protectors
